TopicTitle: Suspiciously Affirm Your Status As A Human

Articles.Content:
8/10 Every human does artwork, if hitten with electroshock in their human-labor camp, every day.

Whoops i meant "Motivated'.

10/10
Because a robot wouldn't choose a human skull for avatar (it would see nothing special in it), while an E.T. wouldn't give a pipe to the skeleton (because it has no lungs).

I don't know how to prove that I'm a human. So, I'm a human, otherwise I wouldn't admit it.

5/10 Wouldn't help because it's a captcha, which doesn't quite work as intended.

 

Am I a human ? Why wouldn't I not be a human ? I'm clearly a... brain ! Flesh brain ! *Human* brain !

wont to be/don't want to be

i m  not that silly thing  most people mean when they use the word " h u m a n" =/^§ it's just a temp sum/soubstratction of stuff wich include writing talking and many others interaction == we re the result of all our interaction and being reminding thoose past present future interaction @one time

9/10

9/10 Google Translate couldn't translate that, and since that is obviously the standard for AI, you must not be a robot.

 

Ah…er, humans, right? They - we're so crazy, am I right guys? Hahaha ha ha….

10/10
U uze google translate. Only humans do this.

I can understand what CraterCracker has written. So, I'm a human in the same degree as he is.

4/10 HAL 9000 could do that.

I am clearly a human. Why else would I take pleasure in forum games?

7/10 Humans could be forcing a bot to play forum games... dunno why...

I am not a robot because a robot could generate optimal kerbal rockets and piloting skills effortlessly. I, on the contrary, am a n00b.

1/10
What does the "n" prefix mean in your id, Zero-Zero-Binary ?

Who? Man.

2/10 you have a generic-ish profile pic. Only robots, with no personality and thus no interests, would have that.

I am a "Hyoomann", or whatever they-we call that-our species.

????/10

I am hoomans toos

9/10 only humans would have any reason to search Google.

I am a human because I use Google too.

0/10
Only a robot from 1950s sci-fi could still think that anybody cares.

I am a human because I use google willingly.

10/10

Everybody knows that Google is just a figment of our imaginations. Computers cannot see it.

 

I am human because of empty brains and full stomachs.

my favorite pie is Qtrupberscotch Pie

100000000000000000000000000000000/10

You are not only the perfect embodiment of today's humans, but the year 2015. (For reference, the perfect embodiment of 2016 is a kid using a hoverboard to hunt Pokémon.)

Now it's my turn, and to demonstrate my humanity I'll count to ten:  3, 95, 98, ME, XP, Vista, 7, 8*, 10.

*Denotes cursed number. Avoid at all costs.

I am human because my earbuds fall out of my ears when I run. Specifically, when I run from killer robots.
